content: I think I'll create a series of posts that share my own experiences and tips on increasing engagement on social media platforms. I'll start with LinkedIn, since I've already had some success with posting articles on digital marketing trends and received 20 likes and 5 comments on them. Then, I can move on to other platforms like Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook. Do you think it's a good idea to share some behind-the-scenes content, like how I plan and schedule my social media posts, or how I engage with my audience?
